title: OT67: Comment Core
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is a visible open thread for bi-weekly discussion.
- Some people scored their predictions for 2016 including JonGunnarsson, Anatoly Karlin, Anders Sandberg, and E. Harding.
- Eukaryote Writes Blog offers Tips For Throwing A New Years’ Prediction Party.
- Ozy from Thing of Things and Quillette are on Patreon for fundraising.
- Shorter posts will be shared by the author sometimes.
- There was an Irvine meetup.
- An Unsong chapter was posted.

Key learnings:
- None explicitly stated.

Key questions:
- None explicitly stated.
